#summary Download and Install
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

=Download=

  # Open the browser on your desktop and go to the [http://code.google.com/p/anttaskmqseries/downloads/list Downloads] area
  # Download the binary archive (.zip for Windows, .tar.gz for `*`nix or Mac]

=Install=

  # Extract the .zip file (or .tar.gz file) on your desktop  

=Configuration=

  # Configure your _build.xml_

Define a classpath (`AntTaskMqSeries.jar` and MQ libraries dependencies):
{{{
	<path id="AntTaskMqSeries.classpath">
		<fileset dir="./lib">
			<include name="**/*.jar" />
		</fileset>
	</path>
}}}

Define the task `AntTaskMqSeries:`
{{{
	<taskdef name="AntTaskMqSeries" classname="uk.co.marcoratto.ant.MqSeries" classpathref="AntTaskMqSeries.classpath" />
}}}

Use the task:
{{{
	<target name="clear1">
	 	<AntTaskMqSeries host="${mq_server}" port="${mq_port}" channel="${mq_channel}" queue="${mq_queue_input}" action="clear"/>
	</target>		

	<target name="write1">
	 	<AntTaskMqSeries host="${mq_server}" port="${mq_port}" channel="${mq_channel}" queue="${mq_queue_input}" inputFile="./dummyUTF-8.txt" action="write"/>
	</target>
	
	<target name="write2">
	 	<AntTaskMqSeries host="${mq_server}" port="${mq_port}" channel="${mq_channel}" queue="${mq_queue_input}" action="write">
			<fileset dir=".">
				<include name="**/dummy*.txt" />
				<exclude name="**/dummy.txt" />				
			</fileset>
		</AntTaskMqSeries>			
	</target>
	
	<target name="write3">
	 	<AntTaskMqSeries host="${mq_server}" port="${mq_port}" channel="${mq_channel}" queue="${mq_queue_input}" listFile="./lists.txt" action="write" skipZeroLength="true" />
	</target>
	
	<target name="writeUTF-8">
	 	<AntTaskMqSeries host="${mq_server}" port="${mq_port}" channel="${mq_channel}" queue="${mq_queue_input}" text="Hello World!" action="write"/>
	</target>
	
	<target name="browse1">
	 	<AntTaskMqSeries host="${mq_server}" port="${mq_port}" channel="${mq_channel}" queue="${mq_queue_browse}" outputFileName="./browse1_" outputFileExt=".txt" match="World" action="browse" override="true"/>
	</target>	
	
	<target name="read1">
	 	<AntTaskMqSeries host="${mq_server}" port="${mq_port}" channel="${mq_channel}" queue="${mq_queue_output}" outputFileName="./read1_" outputFileExt=".txt" action="read" override="true"/>
	</target>
}}}
